title: WA bushfire emergency enters second day as temperature set to hit 42C
description: Hundreds of homes in the Mid West city of Geraldton remain under threat from an out-of-control bushfire, with firefighters battling extremely hot, dry and windy conditions.
content:
One home has been lost and hundreds of others are under threat from an emergency bushfire authorities suspect was deliberately lit in the West Australian city of Geraldton.
Dozens of firefighters ar… [+4836 chars]
de: Der Waldbrand-Notfall in Washington beginnt am zweiten Tag, die Temperatur soll 42 °C erreichen. Hunderte Häuser in der Stadt Geraldton im Mittleren Westen sind weiterhin von einem außer Kontrolle geratenen Buschfeuer bedroht, wobei die Feuerwehrleute mit extrem heißen, trockenen und windigen Bedingungen zu kämpfen haben.
en: WA bushfire emergency enters second day as temperature set to hit 42C. Hundreds of homes in the Mid West city of Geraldton remain under threat from an out-of-control bushfire, with firefighters battling extremely hot, dry and windy conditions.
la: WA bushfire subitis secundo die intrat sicut temperies ad feriendum 42C. Centum domorum in urbe media Occidentali Geraldton manent minari ab autocineto obsoleto, cum globulis pugnantibus valde calidis, siccis et ventosis conditionibus.
